channel.title: Ankita Nandi on The California Tech
channel.description: Recent content in Ankita Nandi on The California Tech

item.title: A Chat with Meri Makhmuryan
item.description: In November 2022, the Caltech Center for Inclusion and Diversity (CCID) welcomed a new Program Coordinator, Meri Makhmuryan, to join the staff.

item.title: Growing Student Body Leads to Undergraduate Housing Shortage
item.description: For almost as long as Caltech had undergraduate students, the institute has guaranteed its students housing on campus for four years. Almost.
